mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carshare.route (Route_no, member_no, process, start_address, start_latitude, start_hardness, end_address, end_latitude, end_hardness) VALUES(#{RouteNo},#{memberNo.memberNo}, #{process}, #{startAddress}, #{startLatitude}, #{startHardness}, #{endAddress}, #{endLatitude}, #{endHardness})
mapper.select: SELECT Route_no, member_no, process, avgFee, start_address, start_latitude, start_hardness, end_address, end_latitude, end_hardness, opponent_no FROM carshare.route where left(Route_no, 1) != 'f' and member_no =#{memberNo} and process = '등록'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM carshare.route where left(Route_no, 1) != 'f' and member_no =#{memberNo}
